description.value:
You imbue a creature with immense positive energy, reversing debilitating effects that most other spells cannot cure. This spell does one of the following effects to the target:

  • Reduce @Compendium[undertaking.conditions.ERBR3AG01H4N1L91]{Exhaustion} by 1 level.
  • Remove one effect that @Compendium[undertaking.conditions.KJXJ0T5RPNC51N4V]{Charmed} or @Compendium[undertaking.conditions.AKLQGCY7ULVB4B64]{Petrified} the target.
  • Remove one curse.
  • Unattune from one item, including attunement to a cursed item.
  • Revert any reduction to one of the target’s attributes.
  • Remove one effect reducing the target’s hit point maximum.
  • Changes one @Compendium[undertaking.conditions.JHOXE7HCCBCD8MSK]{Insane} creature from having Indefinite Insanity to Long-Term Insanity with the same symptoms.
  • Change one @Compendium[undertaking.conditions.JHOXE7HCCBCD8MSK]{Insane} Creature from having Long-Term Insanity to Short-Term Insanity with the same symptoms.
  • Cure one creature of Short-Term Insanity.
  • You cast @Compendium[undertaking.spells-level-2.N04H7KQXVXSTATL9]{Lesser Cure} on the target.

materials.value: diamond dust worth 100gp, which the spell consumes
